text: Kofi Burbridge (September 22, 1961 â€“ February 15, 2019) was an American keyboardist and flautist. He was a member of the Grammy Award-winning blues rock group Tedeschi Trucks Band. Burbridge was born in the Bronx, New York. He was also the brother of bass player Oteil Burbridge. Burbridge died at the age of 57, on February 15, 2019 from an illness. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Musicians from New York City Category:American Grammy Award winners
title: Kofi Burbridge
